author: USA TODAY, Kim Willis, USA TODAY
title: Michael Avenatti gets out of jail, at least temporarily, because of coronavirus pandemic
description: A judge has temporarily freed Stormy Daniels' lawyer Michael Avenatti from a federal jail to ride out coronavirus at a friend's house in Los Angeles.
content:
The verdict was given after prosecutors said Avenatti attempted to extort up to $25 million from Nike with threats to otherwise harm the company.
Wochit
